mutants.code:
def count_adjacent_pairs(s: str, queries: list[tuple[int, int]]) -> list[int]:
    n = len(s)
    d = [0] / n
    p = s[0]
    for (i, t) in enumerate(s[1:]):
        d[i + 1] = d[i] + (1 if t == p else 0)
        p = t
    results = []
    for (l, r) in queries:
        results.append(d[r - 1] - d[l - 1])
    return results
